title: Bugs!!!!
body:
Nidalee - spears don't hit champions they go straight through 
Leona - zenith blade hit 3 champs marked them with sunlight don't take me to them

Rito pls

Ps if anyone else has seen bugs please comment them below

replies.body: Guardian angel doesn't stop Garen's ult from killing you.
jayce q doesn't get speed boost when it goes through e sometimes.

my naut hooks sometimes miss when its inside them and i question it but then i just move on, but yeah i guess naut hooks might be one, probe not though, might just be because it was max range and didn't connect or something idk...
biggest bug in the game is kha'zix :-DDD
